net.floodlightcontroller.util

Class OFDPAUtils.GroupIds

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.util.OFDPAUtils.GroupIds
  • Enclosing class:
    OFDPAUtils

    public static class OFDPAUtils.GroupIds
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates group IDs according to the OF-DPA 2.0 spec. A create helper function is provided for each type of group, including sub-types, which should be used to set a valid group ID in any group mod sent to any OF-DPA switch.
